title: Hot Stocks | Here is why you should buy Tech Mahindra, sell Bajaj Finance in short term - Moneycontrol
content: Hot Stocks | Here is why you should buy Tech Mahindra, sell Bajaj Finance in short term  Moneycontrol
description: Tech Mahindra has started its upwards bounce and on March 4, it witnessed the first sign of strength. The stock price managed to confirm a close above 20-day SMA for the first time in the last two months, said Sameet Chavan of Angel One
